name: The Itch (itch)
description:
My first ever big project.

Inspired by true allergic reactions, The Itch is a 2D platformer centered around using heart rate as a resource to make objects move, grow, and shoot in order to find a doctor who can cure a deadly virus. The path to the doctor is full of obstacles as you traverse cavernous environments filled with plant life and people. You will meet many infected people and disastrous scenes of people dying from it. explore the caverns, navigate through tangled vines, clear up blocked passages, and discover clues about the origin of this deadly virus. 

FEATURES - 

- over 4 hours of gameplay

- A mesmerizing storyline 

- Open-world game implementation

- Beautiful world with all sorts of foliage, characters, etc

- NPCs or town's residents with whom you can talk and gather information.

- Interactive objects including doors, levers, buttons, triggers, and all sorts of things that are there in real life.

- Provide users with interesting and addicting gameplay.

- Multiple saves feature.

-xbox controller supported

- Health system and heart rate based on In Real Life i.e. too low or too high blood pressure will start killing the player.

- Easter eggs and side-missions.

- Available for Windows and Mac.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - 
    MINIMUM:                                                                    
    • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
    • Memory: 128 MB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10 
    • Storage: 70 MB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 7 +
    • Memory: 256 MB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10 or above
    • Storage: 95 MB available space
CONTROLS - 

A, D or left arrow, right arrow to move.

W to jump.

S or specific mouse click to interact and do all stuff like talking etc.

P or Esc key to pause.

CREDITS -
